Name: Export
Description: Module that exports models under specified conditions

Properties.Name: exportAll
Properties.Description: If all the models for all TrainingEpisodes should be exported.

Properties.Name: minCrossVal
Properties.Description: Only export model if cross val error is below this value.

Properties.Name: lastCrossVal
Properties.Description: The last recorded cross validation error for the current TrainingEpisode.

Properties.Name: saveDirectory
Properties.Description: The directory where stuff should be saved.

Functions.Name: startOfQue

MandatoryArgs.Name: saveDirectory
MandatoryArgs.Description: The directory where stuff should be saved.

Functions.Description: Is called at the beginning of the training que. Used to store a copy of the saveDirectory.

Functions.Name: endOfCrossVal
Functions.Description: Is called at end of cross validation. Used to update lastCrossVal.

Functions.Name: endOfEpisode
Functions.Description: Is called at the end of TrainingEpisode run. Used to export model if necessary.
